metadata.title: 5193-1 -- X.Org X Server vulnerabilities
metadata.description: Jan-Niklas Sohn discovered that the X.Org X Server incorrectly handled certain inputs. An attacker could use this issue to cause the server to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code and escalate privileges.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo ua fix USN-5193-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  xserver-xorg-core - 2:1.20.13-1ubuntu1.1 xorg-server-source - 2:1.20.13-1ubuntu1.1 xdmx - 2:1.20.13-1ubuntu1.1 xserver-xorg-dev - 2:1.20.13-1ubuntu1.1 xvfb - 2:1.20.13-1ubuntu1.1 xnest - 2:1.20.13-1ubuntu1.1 xserver-xorg-legacy - 2:1.20.13-1ubuntu1.1 xdmx-tools - 2:1.20.13-1ubuntu1.1 xserver-xephyr - 2:1.20.13-1ubuntu1.1 xserver-common - 2:1.20.13-1ubuntu1.1 No subscription required  xwayland - 2:21.1.2-0ubuntu1.1 No subscription required
